title: Church

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Church is a building in RuneScape that usually contains an altar. Players can pray at an altar to replenish their Prayer points. Some churches have an organ in them, which can be played for pure entertainment.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:ChurchThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Church

A Church is a building in RuneScape that usually contains an altar. Players can pray at an altar to replenish their Prayer points. Some churches have an organ in them, which can be played for pure entertainment.

Churches are located in many areas in RuneScape, but mostly cities and towns.

Churches are usually empty except for NPCs.

Some churches are placed in random areas, such as the chaos temple, and the one next to the entrance of the God Wars Dungeon.

List of Churches[edit | edit source]

  • Varrock
    • Southeast, Zamorakian
    • North-east Church, Saradominist
  • Lumbridge
    • Lumbridge Church, Saradominist
  • Port Sarim
    • Rimmington Church, Saradominist
  • Al Kharid (Duel Arena)
    • Duel Arena Church, Saradominist
  • Near Goblin Village
    • Captured Temple, Zamorakian
  • Ardougne
    • West Ardougne Chapel, Saradominist
    • East Ardougne Church, Saradominist
  • Entrana
    • High Cathedral, Saradominist
  • Seers' Village, Saradomin
  • Edgeville Monastery, Saradominist
  • Ardougne Monastery, Saradominist
  • Witchaven
    • Witchaven Saradominist Church
  • Sophanem
    • Church Of The Pantheon, Desert Gods
  • Morytania/Misthalin/River Salve
    • Paterdomus, Temple of Saradomin; captured by monks of Zamorak in year 169 in the 5th age.
rawContent:
{{External|rs|rsc}}
A '''Church''' is a building in ''[[Old School RuneScape|RuneScape]]'' that usually contains an [[altar]]. Players can pray at an altar to replenish their [[Prayer]] points. Some churches have an [[Church organ|organ]] in them, which can be played for pure entertainment.

Churches are located in many areas in ''RuneScape'', but mostly cities and towns.

Churches are usually empty except for [[Non-player character|NPCs]].

Some churches are placed in random areas, such as the chaos temple, and the one next to the entrance of the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

==List of Churches==
*[[Varrock]]
**[[Varrock#Altars of Zamorak|Southeast]], Zamorakian
**[[Varrock#Altars of Saradomin|North-east Church]], Saradominist
*[[Lumbridge]]
**[[Lumbridge#Saradomin Church|Lumbridge Church]], Saradominist
*[[Port Sarim]]
**[[Port Sarim#Altar|Rimmington Church]], Saradominist
*[[Al Kharid]] ([[Duel Arena]])
**Duel Arena Church, Saradominist
*Near [[Goblin Village]]
**[[Chaos Temple (Asgarnia)|Captured Temple]], Zamorakian
*[[Ardougne]]
**[[West Ardougne#Church|West Ardougne Chapel]], Saradominist
**[[East Ardougne#East Ardougne Church|East Ardougne Church]], Saradominist
*[[Entrana]]
**High Cathedral, Saradominist
* [[Seers' Village#Church|Seers' Village]], Saradomin
*[[Edgeville Monastery]], Saradominist
*[[Ardougne Monastery]], Saradominist
*[[Witchaven]]
**Witchaven Saradominist Church
*[[Sophanem]]
**[[Sophanem#Altar|Church Of The Pantheon]], Desert Gods
*[[Morytania]]/[[Misthalin]]/[[River Salve]]
**[[Paterdomus]], Temple of Saradomin; captured by monks of Zamorak in year 169 in the 5th age.
[[Category:Buildings]]
